'''Chubby Crisis''' is a [[Random Event]] that can occur while exploring the world.

==Steps==
# Defeat all opponents

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
;(Upon triggering the quest)
:'''Paimon:''' These slimes look kinda ticked off...
:'''Paimon:''' Eek! They're attacking!
:'''Paimon:''' Traveler, quickly! Fend them off!
{{Dialogue end}}
